title: My Account Got Hacked :(
body: So my account got hacked. Luckily, I have my account saved on my computer so I can still login in. Someone changed the email so I can't change my password. Please help me :(

replies.body: We'd like to help and get you back on your account!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will investigate your case.  We can help recover and update your info.  Hang tight until then, we'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can!
